name: Boba Fett
personal_goal: Gain rewards from 2 bounties to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.action: Secretly look at 1 contact on your planet.

locked_abilities.ability: After you eliminate a contact for a bounty instead of capturing it, gain [Credits]5,000.

name: Bossk
personal_goal: Have at least 1 mod and 2 gear with a combined cost of at least [Credits]15,000 to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.action: Recover 2 damage from your character and 2 damage from your ship.

locked_abilities.encounter: Fight a combat against a player in your space who has more fame than you. If you win, gain 1 fame.

name: Doctor Aphra
personal_goal: Complete 2 jobs to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.ability: Once per turn, before you perform a skill test, you may gain a skill of your choice for that test.

locked_abilities.planning: If you are on a planet or navpoint, perform a market action. This does not prevent you from performing a market action during your action step.

name: Han Solo
personal_goal: Have a ship with a cost of at least [Credits]15,000 to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

locked_abilities.ability: When you move into a patrol's space, you may test Piloting. If you pass, you do not have to end your movement in that space.

name: Lando Calrissian
personal_goal: Deliver 2 ILLEGAL cargo to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.ability: After you roll dice (for any reason), you may reroll 1 of your dice.

locked_abilities.action: If you are on a planet, you may spend [Credits]1,000 to test Influence. If you pass, gain 1 reputation with the planet's faction.

name: Jyn Erso
personal_goal: Have a damage token on 2 Imperial planets to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.ability: Once per turn, during combat or a skill test, you may turn 1 of your [Focus] resutls to a [Crit].

unlocked_abilities.action: If you are on an Imperial planet, test Stealth. If you pass, place 1 damage token on your planet.

locked_abilities.ability: When a patrol within 3 spaces of you would move during your market action, you may move the patrol toward another player instead of toward you.

name: IG-88 [Droid]
personal_goal: Have 2 droid ([Droid]) crew to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.ability: Once per combat, you may reroll any number of your dice.

unlocked_abilities.action: Take a droid ([Droid]) crew from another player in your space.

locked_abilities.ability: When you would become defeated, you may discard 1 of your crew to recover all damage from your character and ship instead. (Place the crew's contact token on the nearest empty contact space.)

name: Ketsu Onyo
personal_goal: Win 3 combats to gain 1 fame and flip this card.

given_abilities.encounter: Encounter a patrol or contact token that is within 3 spaces of you.

locked_abilities.ability: After you win a combat, gain [Credits]4,000.
